description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP Y land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest.
name: RCPYLandUse
rationale: Represents a very low forcing scenario with the goal of limiting global mean warming to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels based on the Paris COP21 agreement.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway Y Land Use
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway Y, future, scenario, SSPx, RCPy, land use
